subject: Re: [sugar] sanitycheck / libabiword-plugins patches
body:
Yes, it does fail if you don't have cups.hThe build I ran was a standard one, I'm not developing anything at the moment.ManuelOn 5/29/07, 
Marco Pesenti Gritti <mpg@redhat.com> wrote:
Manuel Aguilar wrote:> Hey Marco,>> There is a module that is built with gtk:> ./lib/gtk-2.0/2.10.0/printbackends/libprintbackend-cups.so>Does the gtk build fail if you don't have it?
I don't have cups.h here but everything builds fine.Or are you developing something which depends on gtk printing?Marco
